author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2288 Add support for components whose component ID is not assigned. Instead of the component ID a combination of the component name and the service.pid property assigned to the component is used. If the service.pid property is not assigned to the component, just the component name is used.

author: fmeschbe
msg: Fix Web Console API export to 3.1 and accept any SCR API version starting with 1.0

author: gertv
msg: Build snapshots for bundles required by NMR build

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3017: Added unit test for security failure on sending.
